Title: Relates to real property tax lien transfers; repealer
Summary: Establishes provisions for real property tax lien transfers to assist homeowners facing foreclosure based on unpaid taxes; repeals existing provisions relating to acceptance of taxes from certain loan corporations.
LawCode: Rpld & add Art 9 Title 4 §§960 - 967, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to tax lien transfers; and to repeal title 4 of article 9 of the real property tax law relating to acceptance of taxes from certain loan corporations
